entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is a person who lives in the girls' bathroom. She mentions that she has not seen Harry for months and months.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is present with Harry and Myrtle. He asks who Myrtle was expecting.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who has not visited Myrtle for months and months. He mentions that he had given the place a wide berth for some years now.

relationships.description: Myrtle reproaches Harry for not visiting her for months and months.
Ron asks who Myrtle was expecting.
